story.kicker_image_caption: Tripura TBSE Class 12 Arts/Commerce results declared at www.tbse.in
story.storykicker: Tripura examination board has declared the results of the Class 12  Arts/ Commerce stream examination today i.e. June 2 on the website,  www.tripuraresults.nic.in.
story.storybody:
Tripura Board of Secondary Education (TBSE) has declared the results of the Class 12 HSC board examination on the official website today i.e. June 2.

All the candidates can check the results on the official website, the link for which is www.tripuraresults.nic.in

The examination of all streams of Class 12 was conducted at various centres across the state from March 2 to April 4.

On May 21, the Tripura Board of Secondary Education (TBSE) declared the results of the Class 12 science stream.

Steps to check the results:

  • All the candidates need to log on to the official website, www.tripuraresults.nic.in or www.tbse.in
  • Click on the relevant link
  • Enter your roll number or name
  • Click on to submit
  • The results will be displayed
  • All the candidates are advised to take print out of the same for future reference.

About TBSE:

TBSE was established in the year 1973, is a state agency of the government of Tripura, which is responsible for the promotion and development of secondary education, in the state. Most of the public schools of the state follow the TBSE system.  

 

Read: Tripura TBSE Class 12 (Science) 2016 results declared at www.tripuraresults.nic.in

For exam related news click here.
